title: "Azure gets new Nvidia service for developing custom GenAI apps"
excerpt: "Announced at Microsoft Ignite 2023 this week, the new service is called Nvidia AI Foundry, and it gives businesses a collection of “commercially viable” GenAI foundation models, developed by Nvidia and third parties, they can customise using Nvidia’s NeMo framework and tools."
